random:rainbowify.description: Creates a rainbowified/party-fied gif from an image for slack

useGifIntermediateFrames.name: useGifIntermediateFrames
useGifIntermediateFrames.description: Whether or not to add intermediate frames to gifs to keep the fast rainbow effect. Can increase the size of the gif.

saturation.name: saturation
saturation.description: Saturation level to apply to each frame

lighten.name: lighten
lighten.description: Lightening level to apply to each frame

size.name: size
size.description: Squared size of the output image (scaled to fit)

adventofcode:2022:day1:max-sum.description: Given a list of groups of numbers, calculates the group with the highest total and returns that total

groupingsFile.name: groupingsFile
groupingsFile.description: A file containing groups of numbers. Numbers are one per line and group are separated by empty lines.

top.name: top
top.description: The number of maximum values to take and sum together.
